we apologize for the inconvenience but our website has encountered an error. an error report has been generated and sent to our operation's team. if you see this problem repeatedly or need immediate assistance, please register a complaint with our support department.
share file externally
resolution: your syncplicity account has been configured to restrict sharing folders to recipient(s) not in your tenant. please contact your it team who manages the syncplicity enterprise account for your company and request to change the sharing policy.

issue: recover a deleted folder in a pending off boarding user profile
resolution: yes, it can be restored via the website if the folder is not permanently deleted and if the defined period within the deleted user retention policy hasn't expired yet.

issue: missing shared folder
resolution: please contact your it team who manages the syncplicity enterprise account for your company and request to transfer the folder ownership to you or other active sharing participants so you can continue to access the content of the shared folder

issue: sorry, but we have trouble signing you in. aadsts900235: saml authenthication request's requestedauthenticationcontext comparison value must be 'exact'. received value: 'maximum'
revert off boarding
resolution: recreate your account.an admin can reassign the folders you had to your new account thanks to the offboarding period. they should navigate to your old account that is in pending offboarding and manage user offboarding reassigning all your folders to your new account.

issue: .pst files are missing
resolution: according to your company policy, files like .pst are excluded from syncing. they are excluded because they are continuously changed and this would cause a high load to your device and the local network.

issue: mobile pin reset
resolution: if you would want to set a new pin, you would need to uninstall and then re-install the mobile client

issue: access denied
sync desktop, documents, favorites, pictures from two different computers without mixing them
resolution: desktop, documents, favorites, pictures are special folders that will mix your files if you use the same account for two computers. if you will create pc1 and pc2 parent folders, create also sub-folders for desktop, documents, favorites, pictures so that files from two computers will not mix even if you will sync both parent folders

issue: pptx files opening in protected view
resolution: the protected view is feature of powerpoint. for whatever reason, even security changes in the the product or updates to office may lead to enforcing protected view at customer side. there would be no mechanism on our side to trigger such behavior in powerpoint. we provide the file as-is. still, if they confirm the steps to reproduce (if using wopi connector) may help us confirm for good.

issue: current version does not support mac os catalina
can not place file: (addedincloud) in , reason: can't open file
resolution: exclude the sub-folder or exclude the file extension from synchronization
